42.eng-name: The Book of Hunting and Slaughtering

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Ibn Abi 'Ammar said:"I asked Jabir bin 'Abdullah about hyenas and he told me to eat them. I said: 'Are they game (that can be hunted)? He said: 'Yes,' I said: 'Did you hear that from the Messenger of Allah?' He said: 'Yes
